channel.title: Recent Projects on Ellery Chan
channel.description: Recent content in Recent Projects on Ellery Chan

item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: Introduction In most cases, fraud can be identified only after it happens. In the era of e-commerce, more companies are now starting to realise the importance of fraud detection. In this project, I picked the Credit Card Fraud Dataset from Kaggle. According to the ReadMe File, the datasets contains transactions made by credit cards in September 2013 by european cardholders. The dataset is highly unbalanced, the positive class (frauds) account for 0.

item.title: Speed Reply - Your Smart CRM Solution
item.description: In past few months, we partnered with Speed Reply on developing a smart customer reply solution. SpeedReply is a smart solution that identifies intent of comments on social media and then generate up to three replies for the related comment. Users can further customised the selected comment and submit replies through our system. Our goal is to help brand become more responsive and reduce the workload of social media page managers.

item.title: Ultrasa - Your AI Companion Chatbot
item.description: Introduction Ultrasa is created using RASA X. Basically, it is a chatbot that can chitchat with users.You might wonder how Ultrasa works. Here’s the answer. Link to GitHub Repository For each incoming message, Ultrasa will predict intent of the message and give response based on intent. If the related intent requires some actions like action_suggestplaylist, Ultrasa will carry out the action and then give final output. Components Used To predict intent, We used a sequence of components.

item.title: Job Market Analysis through Indeed.com
item.description: Introduction We scraped all the data analyst and data scientist job from indeed.com.hk and indeed.com.sg. A total of 978 jobs and 1152 jobs are found on indeed.hk and indeed.sg respectively. Link to GitHub Repository Our Findings Here are some of our findings: Singapore provides more data job offers than Hong Kong. Huge variations in job requirements across companies. Indeed.com.sg has better structured data. Python and Excel are essential programming tools.
